Package ch.pschatzmann.stocks.forecasting

Class ForecasterFromSimulationOnHistory

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.stocks.forecasting.ForecasterFromSimulationOnHistory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IForecast, java.io.Serializable

    public class ForecasterFromSimulationOnHistory
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, IForecast
    We use the reference time series with the indicated starting date to calculate the historic price differences from the starting date and apply them to the future.
    Author:
    pschatzmann
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ForecasterFromSimulationOnHistory​()
      We use the forecast data as reference with a random date
      ForecasterFromSimulationOnHistory​(java.util.Date date)
      We use the forecast data as reference with the indicated date
      ForecasterFromSimulationOnHistory​(java.util.Date referenceStartDate, IStockData reference)
      We use the indicated referenceValues (e.g an Index) starting from the start Date

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      StockData forecast​(IStockData stockData, int numberOfForecasts)
      Calculate the forecast for the indicated number of periods
      IStockData forecast​(IStockData stockData, java.util.Date endDate)
      Calculate the forecast up to the end date
